Name: Hypnotic Margarita
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Liqueurs combine harmoniously with lime and tequila in this tangy, fruity Margarita. However, I remain unconvinced by Hpnotiq.
History: Created in 2005 by Gary Regan at Painter's, Cornwall-on-Hudson, New York, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Hypnotic Margarita contains 174 calories
